description.value:
Wondrous item

While wearing this helm you can cast the cantrip @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.IJ97BYFB2ANTKOSW]{Force of Will} as an action. Additionally, the helm has 5 charges, and regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn. These charges can be used to cast either @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.LE5BM8DCSZCPUGMV]{Telekinetic Might} or @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.J9QLMOBH6NXLN5OQ]{Telepathic Network} by expending 1 charge for either.

Alternatively, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.J9QLMOBH6NXLN5OQ]{Telepathic Network} can be cast with 2 charges, which allows it to be maintained even if @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.LE5BM8DCSZCPUGMV]{Telekinetic Might} is also cast with the helm, effectively allowing both to be active at one time.
